original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) A group had reportedly attacked the Pamunuwila, Kiribathgoda residence of State Minister Prasanna Ranaweera on Sunday (18) night.
Sri Lanka Police said that three men attacked the premises at around 10 PM, and no one was at the house at the time of the incident.
However, considerable damage was caused to the main door and windows, said Sri Lanka Police.
The motive for the attack is yet to be determined, and a police investigation is underway.
Bus routes 174 and 255 go on strike against road passenger transport authority
